 =cut
 
+# Calls pod2usage, but lodas the module first.

timeline.message:
Load Pod::Usage lazily in gpdiff.pl and atmsort.pl

This shaves off about 50 ms from each invocation of gpdiff.

Authored-by: Bradford D. Boyle <bradfordb@vmware.com>

Update gpdiff and atmsort to use File::Temp interface

Perl v5.22 deprecated `tmpnam` and v5.26 removed it. RHEL6 has Perl
v5.10.1, RHEL7 has Perl v5.16.3, and Ubuntu 18.04 has Perl v5.26.1. The
File::Temp API is avaiable in all of these versions of Perl.

Authored-by: Bradford D. Boyle <bradfordb@vmware.com>

Remove custom perl from Ubuntu docker image
